This event is completed. **View** [recording](https://youtu.be/M_g1K_CEzbY) of Day 1, [slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1fJbUpbfXX0N19bKTRHD8FYncXqt4E9v7_5d3Yaraw1U/), and [agenda doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SFwP9O0DaxCBK3Uc5S1dwseSZ8bDwrk0Q16hboeFw-g/edit?tab=t.0).

NASA Openscapes invites you to join our annual [Champions Program](https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/champions), this year focused on “A welcome to [NASA Earthdata](https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/) and [earthaccess](https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/data/tools/earthaccess)”. Come expand your knowledge and use of NASA Earthdata, building on momentum behind the `earthaccess` python library and workflows in the Cloud. Next Champions Cohort is planned for Winter 2026.

**Dates**: November 13 & 14, 2025\
**Time**: 10:00 am - 1:00 pm Pacific Time ([find your local time](https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=NASA+Openscapes+Champions+Program+-+Fall+2025&iso=20251113T10&p1=224&ah=3))\
**Where**: remotely, via Zoom\
